name: Not Without You
description: An insanely clever 2D puzzle game, designed by mad scientists! Are you a puzzle Hero? Save the Pilcri!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Celeron G3900 or Greater Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: Standard Additional Notes: 64 BiT Operating System Required
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
